Title: Going Back Home
Credits: Created by Jason Li (jli714@ucsc.edu) , original by  Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu).

Campus.Body: The lecture I was attending just ended.

Bus Stop.Body: I go to the bus stop, I am now waiting for the 18 bus to go home. The bus comes and I get on it. I feel a little tired.

Metro_Station.Body: I go to sleep and I ended up oversleeping. Now I'm at the metro station. I felt something in my pocket. It was the key to my house.

Walk Home.Body: I decide to walk home. I then notice a cat. Also, I see a basketball game going on. Do I:

Basketball.Body: I end up looking at the basketball game for a few minutes. Then I continue to keep walking home

Cat.Body: I end up petting the cat. The cat doesn't mind it. The cat looks happy. Then I continue to keep walking home.

Don't Sleep.Body: I decide to not sleep. After a while, I get off the bus on my stop. Now, I go and walk home

Home1.Body: I'm now at home. As I approach my door, it's locked

Choices.Text: Try to open the locked door.

Home2.Body: I'm now at home. As I approach my door, it's locked

Choices.Text: Try to open the locked door.
Open the locked door with the key

End1.Body: I try budging the locked door with no results, now I'm stuck.

End2.Body: I open the door with my key that was in my pocket. I'm now home.
